Labyrinth

❮ ❯

Labyrinth is a horror thriller game that sets you in a spooky environment where you have to carefully traverse the maze and collect enough collectibles while staying alive from the monster.

One of the earliest projects created in a collaboration with the University mates in year one.

My primary roles were in designing game concept, gameplay programming and mechanics design, focusing on the visual effects, UI, sound design and level design of Tutorial level, and Level 4.

Role

Game Designer, Gameplay Programmer, Player Controller Programmer, Camera Programmer, VFX, Sound design, Level design.

Year

2022

Tools/Technology

Unity3D

Collaborators

Ellie Song, Belida Ouch, Corey

Play Labyrinth
